Best comp size for development

dp

dp

×

Bitmap Export

More

  • Ideal size for development handoff: design dimensions match density-independent code dimensions.
  • Bitmap assets must be exported at times their dp scale: a 100 × 100dp bitmap in your comp becomes a × px asset.
  • Photoshop tip: link your × bitmap assets as smart objects.
  • Sketch tip: for bitmap objects, select Make Exportable and add × format.

Best comp size for Photoshop Retina and prototyping

px

Width

px

Height

More

  • Ideal size when using Photoshop with HiDPI/Retina displays: comps will be at a comfortable working size.
  • Ideal size when making prototypes with flattened bitmap screens: perfect for After Effects or InVision.
  • Tip: append @x to the filename so that developers know to divide by for density independent measurements.
